basic.Peptide Name: Antimicrobial peptide NK-lysin (NKL; pigs, mammals, animals)
basic.Target Organism: [with medium E]:Escherichia coli D21 (MIC=0.5 µM), Escherichia coli Bd2221/75 (MIC=10 µM), Acinetobacter calcoaceticus Ac 11 (MIC=7 µM), Bacillus megaterium Bmll (MIC=1.6 µM);[without medium E]:Escherichia coli D21 (MIC=8 µM), Escherichia coli Bd2221/75 (MIC=39 µM), Bacillus megaterium Bmll (MIC=0.8 µM), Streptococcus pyogenes w.t. (MIC=34 µM), Candida albicans w.t. (MIC=31 µM).
